attributes.action: Legally bind the government to all its manifesto pledges.
attributes.additional_details: People vote in government's on their manifest pledges,if they do not achieve these pledges then they have lied to the people and so should be help accountable to the people of this country..The people should have the power to remove that government as they have lied to the people .. The government are there to represent the people not to do what they want or serves them ..
attributes.background: Pass a law that all manifest pledges have to be achieved within the first 2 years of government

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/724417
